animeDescription: Cain Asbell was an unremarkable guy until he rescued Princess Charlotte. He goes from pauper to Lord, but there's a catch. Cain has to make his land the most prosperous in the country within 5 years. If he fails, he'll lose everything. But if he succeeds, Cain will gain the Princess Charlotte's hand in marriage.  During his quest for success, he faces slavers and bandits. But being a Lord isn't all bad -- he has the right to choose any woman he wants to go to bed with him.
animeStaff: [['Murakami Teruaki', ['Director', 'Storyboard', 'Key Animation', 'Animation Director', 'Character Design']], ['Yoshida Tomohiro', ['Sound Director']], ['Nishi Shigenari', ['Editing']], ['Iida Hiroyoshi', ['Key Animation']]]
